Pretty epic game- some killers are so annoying since they are very overpowered - long waiting times since no one plays killer but game is still enjoyable!

Olá, acredito que tenha muito o que melhorar apesar de estar muito bom o game, adorei a jogabilidade, jogo com bastante interação com equipe, muito estratégico, qualquer erro pode ser fatal, requer muita atenção e concentração em diversos trabalhos durante uma fuga, pontos que acho que devem ser melhorados a tempo: ganchos muito perto um do outro, assim sendo raro as vezes que possamos escapar do assassino ( debatendo-se ), assassinos extremamente mais rápidos em relação aos sobreviventes, uma minima redução na velocidade do assassino e teremos uma partida muito mais justa, dificultando assim, para ambos, trajes muito caros, ficando péssimo para adquirir com mérito de game, arrumem isso, fora as críticas a cima, jogo excelente, de 0 a 10 dou um 8,4. RECOMENDO.

прочёл кучу обзоров на гейское пристанище, считаю своим долгом всунуть усы в эту трещину
1) В игре куча читеров и разрабам на них класть.
Да, это так, но люди, будьте спокойнее, ибо неxep уподобляться всякой швали. Вам мама не говорила в детстве, что инвалидов нужно жалеть?
2) на счёт баланса я согласен на все 100, т.к у мана нет по сотне вторых шансов на случай ошибки.
Будь то орех, часы, осколок, куча палет—у сурвов это мансы, и вы их не переубедите.
2.1) Генраш действительно душит почти всех маньяков, у которых нет мешка на башке и они не летают сквозь стены, но что поделать, некоторые называют это "балансом".
3) Токсичное комьюнити, серьёзно? А где оно в 2022 не токсичное? Да и адекватного человека это не смутит.
4) С обновами выходит куча багов: их фиксят, пускай и по полгода, хотя заедающий блинк на нюрсе меня изрядно подзaeбaл.
5) Против пати невозможно играть:—не играй, тренируйся. Выбери одного сурва как цель, и бегай за ним, потому что фейскемп не даст тебе ничего, кроме как порванные пуканы его братков в послеигровом чате и твоём профиле.
P.S
Нюрсы нет уже 19 дней, мне тоже очень тяжело без неё.
P.P.S
Онрё—терпила.

このゲーム性などについては満足しています。
ただしかけ離れたランク帯どうしのマッチングにより煽るプレイヤーが多く、ゲームを楽しみ切れずに離れていく人が一定数いるはず。
サーバーの過疎化によってある程度のランクさが生まれるのは理解できますが、さすがに白帯キラーに対して赤帯サバの４人で掛かってこられる事態が毎回起こるとなればやめたくなるのも頷けますし、それによって新規のプレイヤーが増えていかないのは悲しいです。

DBD自体は好きですが、上記の理由でBAD評価にします。

Jugabilidad 2/10,aun q tengas 60ms si el killer tiene 200 te pega desde 5mts saltando una ventana o dando 3 pasos despues de saltar una tarima,siguen sin hacer caso a la comunidad sobre lo que se tiene q arreglar o corregir,los killers solo se puede jugar con 3 o 4,si es q queres colgar a alguien antes q esten en la puerta con la linterna haciendo click click.jugas de survi, te campean y tunelean, jugar de killer y te tocan puras premades,y te das cuenta cuando te caen 4 gens en 1.50/2 min de chase,ademas de q te comes penalizacion por las desconexion de la partida por parte del mismo juego. y si tengo q dar un consejo si ya compraron el juego ,no gasten en los personajes de licencias los mas rotos son los q crea el mismo juego.
5/6/2022. El juego tiene una nueva tecnica para ayudar al bando mas debil,los survis, queres tirar un hit y se te regresa el killer 5 mts atras,como si el fajador no le fuera suficiente.

Jogando de killer: existe 2 partida
-A que você vai contra quem não sabe jogar/ta aprendendo/ nivel médio
-A contra os psicopata que desmembrou o jogo até o dentro do código, sabe onde ta todas as pallet do mapa gerador, tudo e sabe meter o loop mais eficiente q existe, que nao erra skillcheck e sabe os spawn dos gerador, Detalhe são 4 deles.

Jogando de survivor: Se o seu time não sabe o minimo o jogo é um inferno 100 % das vez, ainda mais quando o killer usa o camp, nao que seja o problema campar mais sim quando seu time nao sabe botar pressao fazendo gen
-Time que também ta aprendendo a jogar
-Killer mais troll possivel

O jogo é legal, mais se você quiser ser um dos que joga bem seja de killer o survivor você vai precisar de um psicologico forte pra aguentar partida que ja vao ser dificil, e ainda vao ter uns feladaputa pra fica falando merda pra você no final como você é ruim, e etc. 1 % da vezes cai gente descente mais quase nunca é o caso, Vai levar muita porrada mais depois de tudo? vale a pena. de um jeito sofrido mas, vale.

Eu deixo menção horrosa sobre 3 mapas que são uma disgraça
*Autoheaven
-De killer TEM paller loop infinito
-de suvvivor é o pior mapa possivel sem nada de loop
*RPD
-simplesmente uma desgraça até vocÊ aprender todos os caminho e como chega nos canto, fora que é pesado, de survivor quase n acha gem
*Escola do cabeça de piramida
-Horrivel pra achar gem tambem

キラーをプレイしたくて購入される方へのアドバイスです。

① サバイバーがパーティーを組んでいる場合は全滅は諦めましょう。
相手がVCを使っていた場合、誰を追っていても行動が筒抜けなので、現環境では全滅はおろか一人殺害する事すら困難です。
そして、残念ながら、相手がパーティーを組んでいる印などは実装されていません。
相手がSteamでプレイしている場合はプロフィールのフレンド欄を見て判断、それ以外は試合内の行動で判断しましょう。

② ロビーに中国人がいた場合は抜けましょう、ほとんどが悪質なユーザーです。
一度中国人の不正ツール使用者と試合した事があります。彼(もしくは彼女)は空を飛んでいました。

③「開発側のお偉いさんはサバイバー側の誰かに人質を取られている可能性がある」と思いながらプレイしましょう。
明らかな生存者優遇には何か理由があるはずです。私は人質説を信じています。

Game is dead. Just played 10 matches, 8/10 of those matches the killer was AFK, or friendly. At 5 minutes to get into a match and the absurd amount of non-matches you end up having I cannot recommend this game at all at this point. The devs do not take care of it, they stated that they do not ban people any longer using the report feature.

Reinstalled 2 months later after this latest patch 7/25/2022. Tried 2 matches. Both killers friendly. Re:uninstalled.

The game is about an all-powerful Entity that takes people into its dimension to play a game of cat-and-mouse, with one killer hunting four survivors. Then the Entity feeds on these poor saps misery.

The game is miserable to everyone involved, Survivors and Killers. Yet, we keep playing and giving our money to the devs.

Yes, the devs are the Entity and we are their victims. They keep feeding on our suffering and we come back for more.

10/10, will try to stop playing for the Nth time now.
See you again tomorrow!

I originally got this game free on Epic, god best thing ever. But I went and bought it on here after dropping 200 hours on Epic cause I quite enjoy spending money on steam. This game has been a mix of the most dumb stuff I've ever seen, and the smartest plays (I swore I saw someone get signed for nasa after one of my matches). 10/10, absolutely worth picking up.

Well balanced and a lot of fun! I especially love that it isn't about winning but maximizing your bloodpoints, which you do by completing objectives. If you play to win and succeed too quickly, your bloodpoints will be low. If you lose, you can still come out with a nice amount of bloodpoints. I love that!

nice game

Am I recommending this game, no. Do I want to recommend this game, yes. 
This game has great potential, but it's sadly ruined by toxic survivors whom block you from hooking, hurl abuse, tell how to play, spam stun and blind you and teabag ever time you fail to hit/hook/win/do anything the list goes on. 
And the killers are no better, you can tell is having a tough day when they usually pack anti-fun perks, but in the other end you have the killer that just enjoy ruining you game by camping hooks, tunnel you, slug you, hurl abuse and complain about perks that you or the others are using. 
But you sometimes come across players who just want to enjoy the game, be friendly killers and encourage the killers/survivors on their gameplay. The game continues to live on by the updates, licensed killers/survivors, lore, custom games with friends and events.
I just wish that toxicity would end but you can't help stupid.

Love this game. It has a really shitty match making system I will be rank 8 and get lobbies with new players that have no idea what they are doing which ends up getting you screwed over because new players are kinda stupid and dont know what they are doing so it will cause you to lose all items and add ons too. It is a personal favorite game of mine but in reality 2 1 out of every 7 games you might get a decent match. and 1 out of like 10 games youll get a fun and fair game but until then I have to give this game a 4/10 bc it is so inconstant to even play sometimes. (Also dont even get me started on fucking queue times)
 But let me say when you get a match that is all your ranks the game is an absolute 7.5/10 just to inconstant to give it that as a final score.
